articles.author: Matthew Sedacca
articles.title: Boeing 737 Max 9 jets grounded indefinitely pending new safety inspections after scary midair blowout - New York Post
articles.description: “Our only concern is the safety of American travelers and the Boeing 737-9 Max will not return to the skies until we are entirely satisfied it is safe,” the FAA said.
articles.content: The grounding of all Boeing 737 Max 9 aircraft was extended indefinitely pending new safety inspections and a review of the findings after a cabin panel flew off one of the jets last week, the Federa… [+1642 chars]

articles.author: Space.com Staff
articles.title: This Week In Space podcast: Episode 93 — Does America really want to go back to the moon? - Space.com
articles.description: Former NASA Chief Historian Roger Launius reveals the history of America's dedication to moon exploration and what it means today.
